gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.wander: 이 신병이 자유롭게 돌아다닐 수 있도록 하세요.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.holdMyPos: 이 신병이 당신의 현재 직위를 유지하도록 하세요.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.holdPos: 이 신병이 현재 직위를 유지하도록 하세요.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.backToPos: 이 신병을 이전에 맡았던 직위로 복귀시키세요.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.dismount: 가능하다면 이 신병은 현재 타고 있는 차량에서 내립니다.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.mount: 가능하다면 이 신병은 가장 가까운 몹이나 차량에 탑승할 것입니다.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.passive: 이 신병을 전혀 공격하지 않게 만드세요.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.neutral: 이 신병은 적대적인 생활만 공격하도록 설정하세요.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.aggressive: 신병이 적 플레이어와 신병을 발견하면 모두 공격하도록 합니다.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.raid: 신병이 발견 즉시 모든 생물을 공격하게 하세요.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.wander: Allow the recruits to wander freely.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.holdMyPos: Make the recruits hold your current position.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.holdPos: Make the recruits hold their current position.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.backToPos: Make the recruits go back to their previously held position.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.backToMount: Make the recruits go back to their previous mount or vehicle.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.patrol: Make the recruits patrol their previously held position.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.clearTarget: Clears the recruits current targets to attack.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.protect: Make the recruits protect and follow the Mob you are looking at.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.mount: If possible, the recruits will try to mount the Mob you are looking at.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.dismount: If possible, the recruits will dismount their current vehicle.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.move: If possible, the recruits will try to go to the position you are looking at.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.move_hold: If possible, the recruits will try to go to the position you are looking at and hold it.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.forward: Make the recruits move a bout 10 blocks forward to the position you are facing.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.backward: Make the recruits move a bout 10 blocks backward to the position you are facing.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.strategic_f: Order ranged troops to concentrate their fire on a specific area you are looking at.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.shields_up: Make the recruits raise their shields.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.shields_dow: Make the recruits lower their shields.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.upkeep: Sets the block or entity for the upkeep of your recruits you are looking at.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.clear_upkee: Clears the block or entity for the upkeep of your recruits.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.rest: Sets the area where your recruits are allowed to rest.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.formation: Order the recruits to do a formation.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.hold_fire: Disable the use of Ranged weapons.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.fire_at_wil: Enable the use of Ranged weapons.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.hold_strate: Stop the ongoing strategic fire command.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.passive: Make the recruits not attacking at all.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.neutral: Make the recruits attack only hostile living.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.aggressive: Make the recruits attack all enemy players and recruits on sight.
gui.recruits.command.tooltip.raid: Make the recruits attack all living on sight.
chat.recruits.command.rest: %s You are allowed to rest here!
chat.recruits.text.noPlaceInInv: %s: 내 인벤토리에서 음식을 보관할 곳이 없습니다.
chat.recruits.text.cantInteract: %s: 상호작용할 수 있는 포지션에 인벤토리가 없습니다. 새로운 포지션을 찾고 있습니다.
chat.recruits.text.findMeNewChest: %s: 다른 다루기 힘든 인벤토리를 찾을 수 없으니 제 유지 관리를 다시 지정해 주세요.
chat.recruits.text.cantFindEntity: %s: 범위 내에 몹이 없습니다. 제 유지군을 다시 배정해 주세요.
chat.recruits.text.upkeepNotInRange: %s: 내 유지 위치가 범위 내에 있지 않습니다! 내 유지 위치를 다시 지정해 주세요.
chat.recruits.text.recruited1: %s: 그것은 여러분이 가고 있는 영광스러운 길입니다.
chat.recruits.text.recruited3: %s: 당신의 방식이 곧 나의 방식입니다. 영광입니다.
chat.recruits.info.reached_max: 모집할 수 있는 최대 한도에 도달했습니다.
chat.recruits.text.block_placing_warn: %s: 우리 땅에는 블록을 놓거나 부수는 행위가 허용되지 않습니다!
chat.recruits.text.block_interact_warn: %s: 우리 땅에서는 블록과 상호작용할 수 없습니다!
chat.recruits.team_creation.warnVanillaC: Using Vanilla Team-Commands will break recruits mod!
chat.recruits.team_creation.isDisabledIn: Specific Team-Commands are disabled by recruits mod, use the team screen instead!
chat.recruits.team_creation.canEnableInC: The Team-Commands can be enabled in the recruits config.
chat.recruits.team_creation.team_exists: A Faction already exists by that name!
chat.recruits.team_creation.banner_exist: A Faction already uses the same banner!
chat.recruits.team_creation.noname: You need to type a name for your Faction!
chat.recruits.team_creation.nobanner: You need a banner to create a Faction!
chat.recruits.team_creation.wrongbanner: You cant use a blank banner for your Faction.
chat.recruits.team_creation.addedPlayer: You are now a member of %s.
chat.recruits.team_creation.removedPlaye: You were removed from the Faction.
chat.recruits.team.assignNewOwnerNoTeam: You need to be in a faction to assign recruits to members!
chat.recruits.team.assignNewOwnerLimitRe: Faction member can not recruit any more!
gui.recruits.team_creation.sendJoinReque: You have sent a join request to %s.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.assignGroupToTe: Assign this recruit and nearby recruits in the same group to a nearby teammate.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.disbandGroup: Removes this recruit and nearby recruits in the same group from your command.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.keepTeam: Should recruits stay in the same team after disbanding?
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.promote: Promote this recruit to a Companion!
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.messenger: A Messenger can deliver messages and items that are in his main hand to other players.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader: A Commander can patrol and command a group of recruits.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.captain: A Captain can patrol sea routes, use cannons in small ships and command a group of recruits.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.captain_disable: Small ships mod b1.3 or newer needed!
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.scout: A Scout can locate nearby structures and enemy players and recruits.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.governor: A Governor can claim chunks. In villages he will hire recruits and generate income from taxes.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.assassin: A Assassin can assassinate Players with high success.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.spy: A Spy can imitate a recruit so other Players can hire them. He will report the former owner information about the player.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.siege_engineer: A Siege-Engineer can mount and operate Siege Weapons.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.rogue: Rogue can capture enemy players and companions when their health is low.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.special: Opens Companion Screen for special abilities
chat.recruits.text.messenger_player_not_: %s: There is no Player with this name, my lord.
chat.recruits.text.messenger_arrived_at_: The Messenger %s of %s arrived next to you!
The Messenger %s of %s from %s arrived next to you!
chat.recruits.text.patrol_leader_enemy_c: %s: Contact with enemy %s at x= %s y= %s z= %s!
chat.recruits.text.patrol_leader_hostile: %s: Contact with hostile at x= %s y= %s z= %s!
chat.recruits.text.patrol_leader_retreat: %s: Im retreating to first patrol point!
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_s: Begin patrolling from the first waypoint.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_r: Continue patrolling from the current location.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_s: Stop patrolling and reset to the starting point.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_c: Commander continuously cycles waypoints, instantly restarting from the first after reaching the last.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_l: Commander follows the set path from the first to the last waypoint, then returns from last to first.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_a: Adds a patrol point at current position
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_r: Removes the last patrol point in the list.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_i: Select creature types for combat notifications while patrolling.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.assign_recruits: All assigned recruits will be removed from command
chat.recruits.team_creation.canNotAddOth: You can not add a other leader to your Faction.
chat.recruits.info.patrol_leader_info: This companion can patrol pre defined waypoints. The first waypoint is also the retreating point and also important for resupplying. If a the upkeep chest of this companion is set in range the assinged recruits will also resupply form this chest.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.chest: This waypoint will be used as resupply position if the upkeep chest is set nearby.
chat.recruits.text.notWaterWaypoint: %s: I can only patrol water waypoints
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.patrol_leader_s: Ship is needed to start patrolling
chat.recruits.text.messenger_info_to_tar: %s: I have a important message from %s
%s: I have a important message and a gift from %s
chat.recruits.text.messenger_info_on_my_: %s: I shall be on my way in a moment.
chat.recruits.text.messenger_arrived_no_: %s: I arrived, but %s won't accept the message, so I have to return.
chat.recruits.text.messenger_target_play: %s: They read the message, so i'll needed to return.
gui.recruits.inv.tooltip.backToMount: Make this recruit mount his previous vehicle.
gui.recruits.groups.title: Manage your Groups:
gui.recruits.select_player_screen.title: Select Player
gui.recruits.diplomacy_edit.title: 관계
gui.recruits.more_screen.title: 더 보기
gui.recruits.team.tooltip.add: Add a Player from join requests
gui.recruits.team.tooltip.remove: Remove a Player from your Faction
gui.recruits.team.select_leader_tooltip_: Select a new leader before leaving this Faction
